content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 iron ore, bringing my total to 10 iron ore in the inventory along with 15 coal.
# 
# Now, I can proceed to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. I will place the stone furnace again and ensure it has enough coal to smelt all the iron ore I just collected.

# Placing the stone furnace to smelt the iron ore.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=position)  # Assuming 'position' is a valid location.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting coal to fuel the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting the harvested iron ore into the furnace.

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait for smelting.
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 10:  # Checking if 10 iron plates are produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting takes too long.
